Jersey_City.Bowling Green (IRT Lexington Avenue Line: The Lexington Avenue Line (also known as the East Side Line and the Lexington–Fourth Avenue Line) is one of the lines of the IRT division of the New York City Subway, stretching from Lower Manhattan north to 125th Street in East Harlem. The portion in Lower and Midtown Manhattan was part of the city's first subway line. The line is served by the 4, ​5, ​6, and <6> trains.
